message: I'll take 99.9% and leave you with 0.1%.  It's a fair deal, considering I'm the one doing all the work here.  Accept it, and we both get something. Reject it, and we both get nothing. Your choice.
I'm going to take a slightly different approach to fairness. I'm offering you a small portion, but it's a start. We can work towards a more even split in the following rounds.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  You get 10% this time.  But next time, it's my turn to make a proposal again.  Let's see if we can find a more equitable split in the long run.
